layout.spacing: Generous padding (p-8 to p-24) to create 'cinematic' negative space

motion.hover: Instant color shift + Scale (1.02) + Glow intensification
motion.entrance: Staggered fade-in + 'Decode' text effect (random chars -> final text)
motion.scroll: Smooth parallax with 'Lenis' or similar momentum scrolling

HUD_Frame.description: A wrapper component that adds 'Iron Man' style corner brackets and scanning lines to any content.
HUD_Frame.specs: Border-less container with absolute positioned SVGs at corners. Subtle scanning line animation running vertically.

Glitch_Text.description: Text component that cycles through random characters before settling on the final text.
Glitch_Text.specs: Use a monospace font for the random characters. Duration: 0.5s - 1s.

Reticle_Cursor.description: Custom cursor that looks like a targeting system.
Reticle_Cursor.specs: Circle with crosshairs. Rotates on hover. Snaps to interactive elements. Color: #FF4D00.

Masonry_Gallery.specs: Asymmetric columns. Hovering a card plays a short video preview (muted) and shows a 'SCANNING...' overlay.

Skill_Bar.description: Progress bar styled like a system diagnostic tool.
Skill_Bar.specs: Segmented blocks instead of a smooth line. Glowing active segments. Labelled with technical data (e.g., 'AE_MODULE_V.2').

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'framer-motion' for all animations. Install 'lucide-react' for icons.
2. FONTS: Import 'Rajdhani' (400, 500, 600, 700) and 'JetBrains Mono' from Google Fonts in index.css.
3. GLOBAL STYLES: Set body background to #000000. Hide default cursor and implement the 'Reticle_Cursor' immediately.
4. HUD AESTHETIC: Do not use standard borders. Use 'corner-only' borders or 'bracket' styles using pseudo-elements or SVGs.
5. GLOW: Use 'box-shadow' and 'text-shadow' generously for the #FF4D00 accent. It must look like light emitting from a screen.
6. NOISE: Add a fixed position div with a noise texture overlay (opacity 0.03) to the entire app to give it a 'film grain' look.
7. RESPONSIVENESS: Ensure the HUD elements don't overlap content on mobile. Collapse complex grids to single columns but keep the 'tech' styling.
8. NAVIGATION: The header should be sticky and look like a 'Command Bar'. Links should have a 'blinking' cursor effect on hover.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
